title: China cuts NBA broadcasts amid Hong Kong controversy & GE freezes workers’ pensions
text:
The CEO of General Electric makes over $300 million a year while freezing the pension of thousands of workers. China has suspended scheduled NBA broadcasts on Chinese TV following the Hong Kong related controversy. And civil rights attorney Nekima Levy-Armstrong is bringing free legal education to working class communities in Minnesota.
